positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Planned, ideated, and executed the first-ever hybrid edition of Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur in a team of 15 heads leading 40 Core Team Members• Forged associations, worth INR 8.7 Lacs, with corporate giants like Airbus, D-link & Social Alpha as sponsors of Kshitij 2022• Successfully convinced international companies like Marsh McLennan as Title sponsor for the 20th edition of Kshitij 2023• Ideated & orchestrated the first-ever live Virtual Technology Summit with 16 technologists from companies like Microsoft, Infosys, TCS• Coordinated Guest Lecture series of Dr. Ajay Kumar Singh, Ms.Manu Bhaker, Team Jugaadistan• Write up Team Head - Responsible for all the contents which were published on social media platforms, website, and souvenir of Kshitij
positions.title: Sponsorship Head
positions.description_html:
• Planned, ideated, and executed the first-ever hybrid edition of Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur in a team of 15 heads leading 40 Core Team Members
• Forged associations, worth INR 8.7 Lacs, with corporate giants like Airbus, D-link & Social Alpha as sponsors of Kshitij 2022
• Successfully convinced international companies like Marsh McLennan as Title sponsor for the 20th edition of Kshitij 2023
• Ideated & orchestrated the first-ever live Virtual Technology Summit with 16 technologists from companies like Microsoft, Infosys, TCS
• Coordinated Guest Lecture series of Dr. Ajay Kumar Singh, Ms.Manu Bhaker, Team Jugaadistan
• Write up Team Head - Responsible for all the contents which were published on social media platforms, website, and souvenir of Kshitij

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Member of Core Organizing Team responsible for Publicity, Corporate and Alumni Relations with FTR Sponsorship, and event management• Garnered a total sponsorship amount worth INR 2.5 Lacs from the Mumbai (Alumni) region, thus resulting in a 12% year-on-year growth• Associated with Kolkata Ventures,Nirvana Ventures, Icreate,Venture Catalyst as an Incubation,Judging, Mentoring Partners for Bplan event• Successfully organized flagship event of Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur receiving highest ever participation of 400 teams resulting in 25% YoY growth
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
• Member of Core Organizing Team responsible for Publicity, Corporate and Alumni Relations with FTR Sponsorship, and event management
• Garnered a total sponsorship amount worth INR 2.5 Lacs from the Mumbai (Alumni) region, thus resulting in a 12% year-on-year growth
• Associated with Kolkata Ventures,Nirvana Ventures, Icreate,Venture Catalyst as an Incubation,Judging, Mentoring Partners for Bplan event
• Successfully organized flagship event of Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur receiving highest ever participation of 400 teams resulting in 25% YoY growth

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Facilitated printing of articles in 9 newspapers of Telangana and gained national coverage from The Times of India & Dainik Bhaskar• Publicized the technical symposium in central India and Telangana and Andhra Pradesh resulting in an 18% YoY growth in participation• Organised the flagship event of Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur Laws of Motion, and other major events like SourceCode, Overnite, MathOlympiad

positions.description_html:
• Facilitated printing of articles in 9 newspapers of Telangana and gained national coverage from The Times of India & Dainik Bhaskar
• Publicized the technical symposium in central India and Telangana and Andhra Pradesh resulting in an 18% YoY growth in participation

experience.title: Event Coordinator
experience.location: Boeing IIT National Aeromodelling Competition | IIT Kharagpur
experience.description: • Headed the team of 13 volunteers and successfully conducted the Boeing IIT National Aeromodelling Competition at Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur• Managed 120+ participants and guided them about the rules and procedures to be followed contributing 3 finalists for final round at Delhi
